import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './statusboard.scss' import {createBrowserRouter} from "react-router-dom"; import {Modal} from "../Modal/Modal"; const StatusBoard = (props) => { const [namesOfColumns, setNamesOfColumns] = useState([]); const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [modalActive, setModalActive] = useState(false); const [inputValues, setInputValues] = useState([]); let arrayOfInputsValue = []; console.log(arrayOfInputsValue) useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3002/board-titles') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((name) => setNamesOfColumns(name)) fetch("http://localhost:3002/board-data") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setData(data)) }, []) function makeArrayOfInputs(id, value){ return {id: `${value}`} } return (
{props.title}
{ props.dataOfTools.map((img_link,index) => (
) )}
{data.map(({ellipse, img_link}, index) => ( ))}
{namesOfColumns.map(({title, vector},index) => ( ))} {data.map(({company, position, duration, job_id, status},index) => ( ))}
{title}
{company} {position} {duration} {job_id} {status}
{data.map(({points}, index) => ( ))}
setModalActive(false)}>
{ arrayOfInputsValue.push(makeArrayOfInputs(e.target.name, e.target.value)) } }/>
{ arrayOfInputsValue.push(makeArrayOfInputs(e.target.id, e.target.value)) }}/>

); } export default StatusBoard;
